assertions.description: Verify that the homepage loads successfully
Verify that 'Fuel cards' product is displayed with description
Verify that 'Driver Pay' product is displayed with description
Verify that 'AtoB Truck Stop Discount Network' is displayed
Verify that 'AtoB Gas Station Discount Network' is displayed

phases.objective: Scroll to the Who We Serve Section

assertions.description: Verify that 'Local businesses' service is displayed with description
Verify that 'Over the road fleets' service is displayed with description

phases.objective: Scroll to the Partner with AtoB Section

assertions.description: Verify that 'Factoring partners' option is displayed with description
Verify that 'Broker partners' option is displayed with description
Verify that 'Merchant partners' option is displayed with description

phases.objective: Scroll to the Electric Vehicles Section

assertions.description: Verify that the 'Electric Vehicles' section is displayed
Verify that the 'Blog' section is displayed
Verify that the 'About' section is displayed

phases.objective: Scroll to the Contact Us Section

assertions.description: Verify that the 'Contact Us' section is displayed
Verify that the login page is accessible

phases.objective: Navigate to view Get Started Functionality

assertions.description: Verify that the 'Get Started' page is accessible

test_files.name: AtoB Website QA Test
test_files.title: AtoB Website Functionality and Content Verification

assertions.description: Verify that the AtoB homepage loads successfully

phases.objective: Navigate to view the availability of instant transfer methods

assertions.description: Verify that instant transfer methods like Venmo, PayPal, push to debit, and Pay by email or text are displayed

phases.objective: Navigate to the section containing AtoB's banking status

assertions.description: Verify that AtoB is not a bank but maintains wallet accounts with an FDIC insured bank

phases.objective: Navigate to view the availability of AtoB products

assertions.description: Verify that products like Fuel Card, Driver Pay, and AtoB Perks are listed

phases.objective: Navigate to the section containing customer support contact information

assertions.description: Verify that customer support phone number and email are displayed

phases.objective: Navigate to view the social media links

assertions.description: Verify that social media links to Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn are present

phases.objective: Navigate to the section containing fuel discount information

assertions.description: Verify that the average and maximum fuel discount information is displayed
